name: Lazer-Eyed Maniacs
description:
A zombie breakout has left humanity all but in ruin. You are one of the lone survivors - and you are a LAZER-EYED MANIAC.

Use your patented Lazer-Eyes to mow down the hordes of the undead before they take you down. But be careful - your Lazers aren't infinite. Manage your resources wisely, use your environment to your advantage and survive for as long as you can.
